p: The injection of silicone for cosmetic purpose is debatable due to the sequelae of the pneumonitis and the potential for pulmonary toxicity in asymptomatic patients who receive silicone injections. Bronchoalveolar lavage and trans‚Äêbronchial lung biopsy can help to confirm the diagnosis. This case report serves to highlight an emergent danger associated with illicit silicone use for cosmetic purposes and clinicians should be aware of the potential complications.
